quote: There is no greater excitement than to support an intellectual wife and have her support you. Marriage is a partnership in which each inspires the other, and brings fruition to both of you.
quote_letters: THERE IS NO GREATER EXCITEMENT THAN TO SUPPORT AN INTELLECTUAL WIFE AND HAVE HER SUPPORT YOU MARRIAGE IS A PARTNERSHIP IN WHICH EACH INSPIRES THE OTHER AND BRINGS FRUITION TO BOTH OF YOU
